sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react"; import './styles.css'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Table, Button, Form, Tab, Tabs } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { GetClientPersonalInfo, GetClientBusinessInfo } from "../../../APIs/AdminPanelApis"; export default function ClientPersonalInfoDisplay({ id }) { const [personalInfo, setPersonalInfo] = useState(); const [businessInfo, setBusinessInfo] = useState(); useEffect(() => { GetClientPersonalInfo(id).then((res) => { // console.log(res.data); setPersonalInfo(res.data.server_response); // setFullName(res.data.server_response.fullName); }) GetClientBusinessInfo(id).then((res) => { // console.log(res.data); setBusinessInfo(res.data.server_response) }) }, []) function updatePersonalInfo() { /* if (fullNameRef.current.value && accountNameRef.current.value && emailRef.current.value && IDNumberRef.current.value && licenceNumberRef.current.value) { console.log("updated!") } */ } return ( <> {/* Personal Information */}
Full Name: {setFullName(event.target.value); console.log(event.target.value)}} */ /> {/* {beginValidation && !fullNameCheck &&
*
} */}
Email: {/* {beginValidation && !emailCheck &&
*
} */}
Phone Number: {/* {beginValidation && !emailCheck &&
*
} */}
ID Number: {/* {beginValidation && !IDNumberCheck &&
*
} */}
{/* fullName */ personalInfo?.fullName}
Customer ID: {id}
Odoo ID: {personalInfo?.OdooId}
 {/* Working Time and Business Location */}
Business Name: {setFullName(event.target.value); console.log(event.target.value)}} */ /> {/* {beginValidation && !fullNameCheck &&
*
} */}
Business Location: {/* {beginValidation && !emailCheck &&
*
} */}
Business Type: {/* {beginValidation && !emailCheck &&
*
} */}
) }
